name: Mark Twain
message: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

name: Linus Torvalds
message: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.

name: Tina Fey
message: You have to let people see what you wrote. It will never be perfect, but perfect is overrated. Perfect is boring.

name: Mark Twain
message:
```
fetch('https://imgs.xkcd.com/comics/operating_systems.png')
  .then(response => response.json())
  .then(data => this.setState({ future: data }));
```So why doesn't that work?

name: Douglas Crockford
message:

Computer programs are the most complex things that humans make.
